timeouts._comment: Timeout values in seconds - industry-standard configurations
timeouts._connect_note: Time to establish TCP connection (industry standard: 5-10s)
timeouts._read_note: Time between data chunks - detects stalled streams without killing active ones
timeouts._request_note: Total timeout for non-streaming requests (2 minutes)
timeouts._stream_note: Total timeout for streaming requests - LLM generations can take longer (10 minutes)

stream_trace._note: Enable to capture raw Anthropic/OpenAI stream chunks for debugging. Files may include sensitive content.
